title: Apple kugel
ingredients: ['4 matzo crackers, crushed', '3 eggs, beaten', '50g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '1/2 teaspoon lemon juice', '80g apple sauce', '3 Granny Smith apples - cored, peeled and chopped', '60g dried cranberries', 'Topping', '50g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
